Name: Nahide
description:
Nahide was born in 1972. To support her family, Nahide carries out production and sales in the vineyard she inherited from her father. She started to make sarma ("a traditional food of stuffed grape leaves") out of the grape leaves from her vineyard.

Nahide values the education of her child and works hard to provide her child with more opportunities.

Nahide has applied for microcredit from TGMP, a Kiva field partner and wishes to use her Kiva microcredit for the maintenance of her vineyard and buy fertilizer.

Nahide is thankful for all the support from Kiva lenders.
